title: Top Places to visit in Hoshangabad, Madhya Pradesh
content: Hoshangabad also known as Narmadapuram is a City and a municipality in Hoshangabad district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. It serves as the headquarters of both Hoshangabad district and Narmadapuram division. It is located in central India, on the south bank of the Narmada River. Hoshanga
